name: Runs Cucumber Scenarios

steps.name: Authorize user with valid email admin@gmail.com and password admin
Click on dropdown for authorized user in top right corner of header
Checking that 'Додати локацію' pop-up is opened

parameters.name: arg0
parameters.value: "This test case verifies that a 'Керівник' cannot add a location to the list of locations after leaving all mandatory and optional fields empty."

parameters.name: arg1
parameters.value: "Optional[Verify that a 'Керівник' can add a location of a club]"
